title: Lux Plugin Manager
description: Lux Plugin Manager is a command-line tool to manage virtual machines binaries on existing Luxd instances. It enables to add/remove nodes to Subnets, upgrade the VM plugin binaries as new versions get released to the plugin repository.

frontMatter.description: Lux Plugin Manager is a command-line tool to manage virtual machines binaries on existing Luxd instances. It enables to add/remove nodes to Subnets, upgrade the VM plugin binaries as new versions get released to the plugin repository.
